title: Works, could be better
comment: It does as it says, and unshortens the URL, but after it unshortens it, it still auto launches the site anyway. Should be optional not automatic.

title: This app should not exist!
comment: Don't get me wrong, this app is great and solves the problem of short URLs. The reason why I'm saying that it shouldn't exist is that android itself should know how to correctly parse short URLs for specific apps and not just open it in a browser :)  Anyway, until android sorts it out, this app is great :)

title: Because life is too short for short URLs
comment: App does what it says on the tin.

title: Was about to learn Android dev to write it myself!
comment: …when I had the idea to search Play in case someone already had the same idea.  Merci beaucoup!
